author: veithen
msg: AXIOM-375: Deprecated the usage of OMElement#declareNamespace(String,String) with prefix="".

author: rickhall
msg: Fragments may get re-resolved, so we have to special case this situation
to create a union of its host wires. (FELIX-2950)

author: iocanel
msg: [KARAF-642] Create an interface for DiscoveryServices. Added a module that provides a cloud discovery service (using blobstore blackboard pattern). Added a recurring task that uses available discovery services to update the tcp/ip member list.

author: gregames
msg: z/OS iconv uses ISO charset names with only one dash, e.g. ISO8859-1

author: sarowe
msg: SOLR-2659: Fix ExternalPaths.determineSourceHome() and SolrJettyTestBase.createJetty() to allow Solrj tests to pass.
